title: 86 Special Edition: Senya ni Akaku Hinageshi no Saku

alternative_titles.en: 86 Eighty-Six: Special Edition - The Poppies Bloom Red on the Battlefield
alternative_titles.ja: 86-エイティシックス- Special Edition「戦野に紅く雛罌粟の咲く」

synopsis:
"I have a duty to see everything that happens. No matter how much pain and sadness there is... Because I am Spearhead's handler."

86 Special Edition: Senya ni Akaku Hinageshi no Saku recaps the story told in 86 through the perspective of Vladilena "Lena" Milizé—the commander of Shinei Nouzen and the Spearhead Squadron.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
